parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets parameters for helicopter rotor wash. Visually it affects how much the grass, bushes and trees bend and how much the particles blown under a helicopter and how big is the area of the effect. Default [1.0, 1.0].<BR>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Both parameters can't take 0, it'll just be ignored. If you need to disable effects, put very small values.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setLocalWindParams''' [strength, diameter]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [strength, diameter]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> strength: [[Number]] - down-force wind strength

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> diameter: [[Number]]  - area affected

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setLocalWindParams]] [10, 5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setWind]], [[wind]], [[setWindStr]], [[setWindDir]], [[setWindForce]], [[windDir]], [[windStr]], [[gusts]], [[setGusts]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
